Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at Western/14th
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Western, Cermak, Marshall and Ogden due to street blockage near Western/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Western, Cermak, Marshall and Ogden, due to street blockage near Western/14th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Jackson/Ashland
ShortDescription: Updated: WB 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Racine, Madison, Ashland and Van Buren due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Racine, Madison, Ashland and Van Buren due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
